attributes.title: Credential Access File Detection
attributes.description: Detects unauthorized access to browser credential files.

kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON: {"query":{"language":"kuery","query":"(file.path: \"*AppData\\Local\\Google\\Chrome\\User Data*\\Login Data*\" OR file.path: \"*AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Edge\\User Data*\\Login Data*\" OR file.path: \"*AppData\\Roaming\\Mozilla\\Firefox\\Profiles*\\logins.json*\" OR file.path: \"*AppData\\Roaming\\Mozilla\\Firefox\\Profiles*\\key4.db*\" OR file.path: \"*AppData\\Local\\BraveSoftware\\Brave-Browser\\User Data*\\Login Data*\" OR file.path: \"*AppData\\Roaming\\Opera Software\\Opera Stable\\Login Data*\") AND NOT process.name: (\"chrome.exe\" OR \"firefox.exe\" OR \"msedge.exe\" OR \"brave.exe\" OR \"opera.exe\")"},"filter":[],"index":"endpoint_filesystem_logs*","sort":["@timestamp","desc"]}
